original: @#/_/tshhogs kyi bdag po chen po khams
analyzed: @#/_/tshhogs kyi bdag po chen po khams
translated: The great lord of the assembly,🔽

original: gsum dbang sdud dmar po'i
analyzed: gsum dbang sdud dmar po'i
translated: The Red Mahākāla, the Lord of Ganas,🔽the Method of Accomplishing the One Who Subjugates the Three Realms

original: sgrub pa'i thabs/ tshhogs kyi bdag po 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi sgrub thabasag gi sgrub thabs/🔽@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma ha ga na pa ti d+ha tu tri ka ra ta shi ku ru sa d+ha nam/
analyzed: sgrub pa'i thabs/ tshhogs kyi bdag po 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi sgrub thabasag gi sgrub thabs/ @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma ha ga na pa ti d+ha tu tri ka ra ta shi ku ru sa d+ha nam/
translated: The Method of Accomplishing the Lord of Ganas, the Powerful One of Desire🔽In Sanskrit: Mahāgaṇapati dhātu trikara taśikurusaṃdhana🔽In Tibetan: The Red Mahākāla, the Lord of Ganas,

original: bod skad du/_tshhogs kyi bdag po chen po khams gsum dbang sdud dmar po'i
analyzed: bod skad du/_tshhogs kyi bdag po chen po khams gsum dbang sdud dmar po'i
translated: the Method of Accomplishing the One Who Subjugates the Three Realms🔽Homage to the Lord of the World.

original: sgrub pa'i thabs/_'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/de nas lha chen
analyzed: sgrub pa'i thabs/_'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/de nas lha chen
translated: Then, the glorious Maheśvara🔽should be accomplished as the Lord of Ganas.

original: dbang phyug dpal/_/tshhogs kyi bdag po sgrub par bya/_/nags tshhal ri bo
analyzed: dbang phyug dpal/_/tshhogs kyi bdag po sgrub par bya/_/nags tshhal ri bo
translated: In a red forest grove or mountain,🔽facing west, in an isolated place, the maṇḍala

original: dmar po ru/_/nub ltas dben par man+dal ni/_/zla kham ra ga lta bu la/_/tshan
analyzed: dmar po ru/_/nub ltas dben par man+dal ni/_/zla kham ra ga lta bu la/_/tshan
translated: should be like a crescent moon, smeared with red sandalwood.

original: dan gur gum dag gis byug_/me tog dmar po'i tshhom bu dgu'am lnga dgod/_/sku
analyzed: dan gur gum dag gis byug_/me tog dmar po'i tshhom bu dgu'am lnga dgod/_/sku
translated: Arrange nine or five flower heaps of red flowers.🔽Arrange the images and vases well on the maṇḍala.

original: dang bum pa legs par man+dal ste dgram/_/rnam lnga la sogs mchod pa ni/_/rig
analyzed: dang bum pa legs par man+dal ste dgram/_/rnam lnga la sogs mchod pa ni/_/rig
translated: The offerings of the five elixirs and so forth

original: pa 'dzin pas ci nus bsham/_/la du la phug gtor ma yang /_/me tog dmar
analyzed: pa 'dzin pas ci nus bsham/_/la du la phug gtor ma yang /_/me tog dmar
translated: and arrange them as much as you can.🔽Also set out a torma of radish and garlic,🔽adorned with red flowers.🔽Holding a garland of lotus stalks

original: pos brgyan pa dgod/_/pad+ma'i sdong po'i phreng ba dag_/legs par g.yas pas
analyzed: pos brgyan pa dgod/_/pad+ma'i sdong po'i phreng ba dag_/legs par g.yas pas
translated: with your right hand, do the recitation.

original: bzung la bzlas pa bya/_/de nas bdag nyid mgon po ni/_/'od dpag med
analyzed: bzung la bzlas pa bya/_/de nas bdag nyid mgon po ni/_/'od dpag med
translated: Then, as Protector, you should generate yourself as Hayagrīva,🔽the wrathful one of Amitābha.

original: tshhogs kyi bdag po chen po khams gsum dbang sdud dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs🔽pa'i khro bor rta mgrin du skyed/_/de'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/man+dal steng gi
analyzed: tshhogs kyi bdag po chen po khams gsum dbang sdud dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs pa'i khro bor rta mgrin du skyed/_/de'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/_/man+dal steng gi
translated: The Sādhana of the Great Gaṇapati, Red Seizer of the Three Realms🔽From the body of the deity above the maṇḍala

original: tshhom bu 'i steng gi sku las/_/lha chen 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ni/_/sku mdog dmar
analyzed: tshhom bu 'i steng gi sku las/_/lha chen 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ni/_/sku mdog dmar
translated: on the lotus and sun seat, the great god Īśvara of desire🔽is generated from the red hūṃ.

original: po hri las skyed/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi bgrang phreng g.yas dang po dang /_/g.yon dang po
analyzed: po hri las skyed/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi bgrang phreng g.yas dang po dang /_/g.yon dang po
translated: He has one face and four hands, holding a rosary in the first right🔽hand and a radish in the first left hand,

original: la phug 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya dang /_/la du'i phor pa g.yas logs su/_/phreng ba
analyzed: la phug 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya dang /_/la du'i phor pa g.yas logs su/_/phreng ba
translated: and the bowl of garlic is imagined below the rosary🔽in the right hand.

original: 'dzin pa'i 'og tu bsam/_/dgra sta dmar po g.yon 'og ma yin par/_/glang
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i 'og tu bsam/_/dgra sta dmar po g.yon 'og ma yin par/_/glang
translated: The red axe is in the lower left hand,

original: chen gdong la ral pa can/_/mu tig la sogs brgyan gyis spras/_/sku smad ldang nag dbang sngon dar gyis blubs/_/do shal la sogs phreng bas mdzes/_/zla ba
analyzed: chen gdong la ral pa can/_/mu tig la sogs brgyan gyis spras/_/sku smad ldang nag dbang sngon dar gyis blubs/_/do shal la sogs phreng bas mdzes/_/zla ba
translated: and it is beautified with necklaces and garlands.🔽Upon a moon and white lotus,🔽with the right leg extended,

original: pad dkar steng na ni/_/g.yas rkyang ba yi tshhul gyis ni/_/bum pa sngon po'i khri🔽la bzhugs/_/'od zer dmar 'phros lcags kyu can/_/ye shes dgug sogs
analyzed: pad dkar steng na ni/_/g.yas rkyang ba yi tshhul gyis ni/_/bum pa sngon po'i khri la bzhugs/_/'od zer dmar 'phros lcags kyu can/_/ye shes dgug sogs
translated: he sits upon a throne of a blue vase.🔽Red light rays emanate and draw in the hook-holder,🔽and the wise one performs the ritual🔽just like the ritual of summoning awareness.

original: cho ga ni/_/mkhas pas tshhul bzhin byas nas kyang /_/spro sdu man ngag can gyis
analyzed: cho ga ni/_/mkhas pas tshhul bzhin byas nas kyang /_/spro sdu man ngag can gyis
translated: The one who has the oral instructions of expanding and🔽contracting🔽visualizes the object of the practice, and through recitation,

original: ni/_/sgrub bya gang 'dod yid la dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin sgom/_/bzlas pas sku🔽gsung thugs rnams bskul/_/sku bskul ba'i snying po om trigah_na ba ta ye/_ma ha rak+sha
analyzed: ni/_/sgrub bya gang 'dod yid la dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin sgom/_/bzlas pas sku gsung thugs rnams bskul/_/sku bskul ba'i snying po om trigah_na ba ta ye/_ma ha rak+sha
translated: the body, speech, and mind are invoked.🔽The essence of invoking the body is “Om trighana bhavaya🔽ye maharakshasa samaya hung hung phet phet.”🔽The essence of invoking speech is “Om maha padma ghanapataye jhe svaha.”

original: sa ma 'bum phrag gcig ya hu~m dzahgsung bskul ba om ma ha pad+ma gahna pa ta ye bye swa ha/_thugs
analyzed: sa ma 'bum phrag gcig ya hu~m dzahgsung bskul ba om ma ha pad+ma gahna pa ta ye bye swa ha/_thugs
translated: The essence of invoking mind is “Om maha padma ghanapataye jhe svaha.”

original: skul ba hri_tshi ta gu na sid d+hi ba ra ta ka swa ha/_nye ba'i snying pos gsum ka skul gsung om ma ha🔽rak+ta ga na pa ta ye/_a kan+ta ya dza hum bam hoh_swa d+ha ya 'bum phrag gcig swa ha/_zhes🔽pa'i gsang sngags ma nor bzlas/_/thun 'tshhams gtor mas mchod par bya/_/🔽stod pas dngos grub gsol ba gdab/_/dang po theg chen bsam pa las/_/cho
analyzed: skul ba hri_tshi ta gu na sid d+hi ba ra ta ka swa ha/_nye ba'i snying pos gsum ka skul gsung om ma ha rak+ta ga na pa ta ye/_a kan+ta ya dza hum bam hoh_swa d+ha ya 'bum phrag gcig swa ha/_zhes pa'i gsang sngags ma nor bzlas/_/thun 'tshhams gtor mas mchod par bya/_/ stod pas dngos grub gsol ba gdab/_/dang po theg chen bsam pa las/_/cho
translated: The near essence is: “Oṃ, great blood, Ganapati, come, come, seize, seize, bind, bind, crush, crush, kill, kill,🔽bind, bind, svāhā!”🔽Recite this unmistaken secret mantra one hundred thousand times.🔽In the breaks, make offerings with the torma.🔽In the morning, supplicate for spiritual powers and make the offering of praise.🔽First, from the thought of the Great Vehicle,🔽
